# AI AppSec Academy

> Elite one-on-one cybersecurity training in Application Security, DevSecOps, Product Security, Supply Chain Security, and AI/ML Defense. Led by Viswanath Chirravuri — GSE #335, SANS Teaching Assistant, CompTIA SME, RSA 2024 & 2026 Speaker, and Doctor of Engineering candidate in Cybersecurity.

AI AppSec Academy offers personalized, hands-on training across seven core security domains: Software Application Security (SAST, DAST, SCA, OWASP Top 10), DevSecOps, Product Security, Software Supply Chain Security, Agentic AI Security, LLM Application Security, and ML Pipeline Defense. All training is delivered one-on-one with direct instructor access, adaptive to individual skill levels, and globally available across time zones.

## Training Programs

- [The Power Hour](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Executive consultation and career coaching session (60 min)
- [Product Security Strategy](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Threat modeling, secure architecture review, and security program design (4 hrs)
- [SAST Tools Deep Dive](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Hands-on static analysis security testing with industry tools (4 hrs)
- [SCA Tools Deep Dive](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Software Composition Analysis for open-source dependency risk (4 hrs)
- [DAST Tools Deep Dive](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Dynamic application security testing methodologies and tools (4 hrs)
- [SBOM & Supply Chain Security](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Software Bill of Materials and supply chain risk management (4 hrs)
- [DevSecOps Tooling & Pipeline Security](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): CI/CD security integration and shift-left practices (4 hrs)
- [OWASP Security Tools Masterclass](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Comprehensive OWASP tooling and methodology workshop (4 hrs)
- [Applied AI: RAG, Fine-tuning & MLSecOps](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Building and securing AI/ML pipelines with RAG and fine-tuning (4 hrs)
- [Vibecoding: Secure AI-Assisted Development](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Secure coding practices when using AI coding assistants (4 hrs)
- [DevSecOps & AppSec Workshop](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Full-day hands-on workshop covering DevSecOps and application security (8 hrs)
- [Enterprise AppSec Bootcamp](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Multi-day enterprise application security training (2-5 days, custom)
- [AI Security Bootcamp](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Multi-day AI and ML security training for teams (2-5 days, custom)

## Pages

- [Home](https://aiappsecacademy.com/): Overview of the academy, instructor credentials, and core security domains
- [About](https://aiappsecacademy.com/about): Instructor profile — 20+ years in cybersecurity, 35+ certifications, GIAC Security Expert, academic background
- [Courses](https://aiappsecacademy.com/courses): Full catalog of training programs with pricing and details
- [Why Us](https://aiappsecacademy.com/why-us): Value proposition — personalized one-on-one training, direct instructor access, adaptive curriculum
- [Blog](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog): Articles and insights on AI/ML security and application security
- [Open Source](https://aiappsecacademy.com/open-source): Contributions including Secure-ML Framework, OWASP Secure Coding Practices, and ML research
- [FAQ](https://aiappsecacademy.com/faq): Frequently asked questions about enrollment, scheduling, content, and technical requirements

## Blog — Securing AI/ML

- [The Evolution of Agentic AI Development: From Monolithic to Distributed Systems](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/agentic-ai-evolution): A practical journey through 4 architectural stages of building secure, local-first multi-agent AI systems
- [From Monolith to Micro-Agents: My 4-Stage Journey in Building Secure Local AI Systems](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/from-monolith-micro-agents-my-4-stage-journey-secure-local-2qcjc/): Four architectural phases for building a local AI system with security safeguards
- [Why "AI Skills Developer" Will Be the Breakout Role of 2026](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/why-ai-skills-developer-breakout-role-2026-viswanath-s-chirravuri-lpyzc/): An emerging role combining software engineering with LLM orchestration
- [AI/ML Security: Old Attacks, New Targets](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/aiml-security-old-attacks-new-targets-viswanath-s-chirravuri-m7i3c/): How adversaries apply classic attack techniques to AI systems
- [Evolving Protocols Around Agentic AI: MCP, A2A, ACP, AGNTCY](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/agentic-ai-mcp-a2a-acp-agntcy-viswanath-s-chirravuri-x3cuc/): Emerging standards for agent-based AI systems
- [The 3 Phases of AI Mastery: Skills, Tools, Roles, and Privacy Practices](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/path-mastering-aiml-step-by-step-approach-viswanath-chirravuri-i9lyc/): Three AI proficiency levels with security considerations
- [ML Cyberattacks Taxonomy](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/ml-cyberattacks-taxonomy-vis-chirravuri/): Framework for understanding cyberattacks targeting ML systems
- [Security & Privacy Risks in Machine Learning](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/security-privacy-risks-machine-learning-vis-chirravuri/): Threats to data confidentiality, model integrity, and mitigation strategies

## Blog — Application Security

- [Introducing ThreatModelingGPT: Your AI-Powered Threat Intelligence Partner](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/threatmodelinggpt): A free Custom GPT for threat modeling using STRIDE, PASTA, LINDDUN, MAESTRO, and more
- [AppSec Using Agentic AI: Running SCA Scans via Claude CLI Skills](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/appsec-using-agentic-ai-running-sca-scans-via-claude-cli-chirravuri-564cc/): Automating SCA scans through Claude CLI Skills
- [Secure Source Code by Design with Cline](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/secure-source-code-design-cline-practical-guide-teams-chirravuri-pfemc/): Configuring Cline to enforce OWASP security standards during code generation
- [Artifact Digital Signing and Verifying with Sigstore Cosign](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/artifact-digital-signing-verifying-sigstore-cosign-chirravuri/): Digital signing and verification for software supply chain security

## Open Source Contributions

- [Secure-ML Framework](https://github.com/thalesgroup/secure-ml): End-to-end ML pipeline security framework with 40+ curated open-source security tools. Presented at OWASP LASCON 2024.
- [OWASP Secure Coding Practices (Markdown)](https://aiappsecacademy.com/open-source): 22 modular rule files for security domains with Claude Code Skills integration and MCP server deployment
- [ML Research: Local LLM Fine-Tuning](https://aiappsecacademy.com/open-source): HuggingFace Transformers and PEFT/LoRA fine-tuning on cybersecurity data

## Custom GPTs

- [ViswanathSChirravuri_GPT](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/viswanathschirravuri-gpt): A dedicated Custom GPT that answers questions about the instructor's professional profile
- [ThreatModelingGPT](https://aiappsecacademy.com/blog/threatmodelinggpt): AI-powered threat intelligence partner for security teams
